SEARCH
Package access

Class InventoryDAO

java.lang.Object
access.InventoryDAO
public class InventoryDAO extends Object
Data access object for the Inventory database table - keeps track of current items in the store - retrieves data from the current inventory - allows for updates to current items as well as additions to the database

    • getInventory

      public ArrayList<Inventory> getInventory()
      Fetches a list of all the items in the inventory to be used by managers
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Inventory objects that has all items currently in the inventory

    • updateQuantity

      public void updateQuantity(int item_id, double item_quantity)
      Updates the quantity of an item in the inventory; used to update as orders are made
      Parameters:
      item_id - int representing the item ID of the item to update
      item_quantity - double representing the new quantity of the item
